Draft, WSB Study on "Publication" credit
for Use of the Hew Media
With the growing utilization of new media in education
the traditional concept of "publication" credit seems to bo
undergoing re-evaluation* The NAJEB hopes to determine the
present scope of this trend, and requests your assistance by
completing the following two questions*
1. Does your institution have a policy "publication"
credit for faculty members?
Tes __ Ho_
If "yes," would you please enclose a copy, or make a
brief sussnaiy here.

other than print?
